Tunable.name: EMPLOYEE_ADDITIONAL_IMMUNITY
Tunable.description: This unit less number will be a boost the employee's importance when the culling system scores this Sim. Higher the number, lower the probability this Sim being culled. Performance WARNING: Remember that employees can be hired by many households via rotational gameplay. This number has to balance the desire to keep this Sim around as well as supporting multiple player families with businesses.

Tunable.name: HOURS_BETWEEN_OFF_LOT_SIMULATIONS
Tunable.description: The number of hours between off lot simulations for business.

Tunable.name: PROPERTY_OWNER_PAYOUT_TIMER
Tunable.description: The amount of time, in hours, that pass after the delinquency timer (in sims.bills) that payouts for property Owners will be done. If they are the active household they will get paid at this time for all non arrears properties with renters. If they are not active, we will cache the first week of rent to be paid for their next time active. Additional triggers will not actually add to the payout value, but will clear rent for the tenants. Any change to this should be run by automated property management to ensure rent arrears calculations are handled within the correct time frame.

TunableTuple.name: PROPERTY_OWNER_RECEIVES_OFFLINE_PAYOUTS_NOTIFICATION
TunableTuple.display: Property Owner Receives Offline Payouts Notification
TunableTuple.description: A notification that shows up for property owners when they receive payment upon signing in after payments processed
